title: rules rules and about ruless
content:
first year here. my sems almost over, theres a lot of obligatory vague ass rules here, but ive never seen a rule book. terms and conditions or such

if anyone knows. pls send me a copy or link me in comments/ i anna try somethinh

comments.body: Bros bout to do a little tomfoolery

Your sem is NOT almost over
More like it just started-
Only one way to figure out what rules and loopholes are there ðŸ‘€

Jumping from any floor of any building is totally legal trust me!!
(Jk don't kys)
wait how is ur sem almost over, ISA1 itself didn't happen.
Bruh world don't revolve around btech, other courses exist

ohh i did not know different courses had different exam timings  
makes sense now that i think about it
There will be. Roll with it
